abstract: Weak economic data and concerns about fallout from the assassination of the Pakistani opposition leader, Benazir Bhutto, pushed shares lower on Thursday.
snippet: Weak economic data and concerns about fallout from the assassination of the Pakistani opposition leader, Benazir Bhutto, pushed shares lower on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: American stock markets tumbled and oil prices surged on Thursday as investors grappled with weak economic data and concerns about financial fallout from the assassination of the Pakistani opposition leader, Benazir Bhutto.

headline.main: Weak Data Puts Shares in a Tailspin
headline.print_headline: Weak Data Puts Shares In a Tailspin
